DOC.brief_summary: This observational study will investigate the tolerability and efficacy of Tarceva (erlotinib) in daily clinical practice under routine conditions in patients with locally advanced or metastatic non small cell lung cancer. Data will be collected for approximately 12 months.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Tarceva (Erlotinib) in Routine Practice For First Line Maintenance Therapy in Patients With Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Adult patients with locally advanced or metastatic nonsmall cell lung cancer (stage IIIb or IV) with stable disease after 4 cycles of standard platinumbased firstline chemotherapy Not willing or not able to sign written informed consent form
